description.english: Solve one Raw Data
description.german: Löse das Rätsel der ersten Rohdaten.
description.french: Résoudre un bloc de données brutes
description.spanish: Resuelve un Dato Bruto
description.russian: Разберите один пакет первичных данных
description.brazilian: Resolva um dado bruto.

description.english: Solve Kitchen Puzzle
description.german: Löse das Küchenrätsel.
description.french: Résoudre l'énigme de la cuisine
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzzle de la cocina
description.russian: Разгадайте головоломку на кухне
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma da cozinha.

description.english: Found Laptop in the Objective State (Death Memory)
description.german: Finde den Laptop im objektiven Zustand (Todeserinnerung).
description.french: Trouver l'ordinateur portable dans l'état objectif (souvenir de mort)
description.spanish: Encontrar el computador en el estado objetivo
description.russian: Найдите ноутбук в объективном режиме (воспоминание о смерти)
description.brazilian: Encontre o laptop no estado objetivo (memória da morte).

description.english: Enter the repressed room
description.german: Betritt den unterdrückten Raum.
description.french: Entrer dans la pièce réprimée
description.spanish: Entra al cuarto reprimido
description.russian: Войдите в скрытую комнату
description.brazilian: Entre no quarto reprimido.

description.english: Found Martha's Room in Reality
description.german: Finde Marthas Zimmer in der Realität.
description.french: Trouver la chambre de Martha dans la réalité
description.spanish: Encontrar el cuarto de Martha en la realidad
description.russian: Найдите комнату Марты в реальности
description.brazilian: Encontre o quarto de Marta na realidade.

description.english: Solved the first perspective puzzle in the Dream Sequence
description.german: Löse das erste Perspektivrätsel in der Traumsequenz.
description.french: Résoudre la première énigme de perspective dans la séquence onirique
description.spanish: Resolver el primer puzzle de perspectiva en la secuencia del sueño
description.russian: Решите первую перспективную головоломку в последовательности снов
description.brazilian: Resolva o primeiro enigma de perspectiva na sequência do sonho.

description.english: Solve the shame puzzle
description.german: Löse das Schamrätsel.
description.french: Résoudre l'énigme de la honte
description.spanish: Resuelve el puzzle de la verguenza
description.russian: Решите головоломку со стыдом
description.brazilian: Resolva o enigma da vergonha.

description.english: Give an incorrect password on purpose
description.german: Gib absichtlich ein falsches Passwort an.
description.french: Donner sciemment un mauvais mot de passe
description.spanish: Da el password incorrecto a propósito
description.russian: Нарочно назовите неправильный пароль
description.brazilian: Dê uma senha errada de propósito.

description.english: Tell Tom that you don't know the password.
description.german: Sag Tom, dass du das Passwort nicht kennst.
description.french: Dire à Tom que vous ne connaissez pas le mot de passe
description.spanish: Dile a Tom que no sabes el password
description.russian: Скажите Тому, что вы не знаете пароля
description.brazilian: Diga ao Tom que não sabe qual é a senha.

description.english: Solve the password after seeing Johanna's room in reality
description.german: Finde das Passwort, nachdem du Johannas Zimmer in der Realität gesehen hast.
description.french: Résoudre l'énigme après avoir vu la chambre de Johanna dans la réalité
description.spanish: Resuelve el password después de ver el cuarto de Johanna en la realidad
description.russian: Подберите пароль, увидев комнату Джоанны в реальности
description.brazilian: Descubra a senha após ver o quarto de Johanna na realidade.

description.english: Solved the password gathering only information from the Childhood memory
description.german: Finde das Passwort nur anhand von Informationen aus den Kindheitserinnerungen.
description.french: Résoudre le mot de passe en recueillant uniquement des informations à partir du souvenir d'enfance
description.spanish: Resuelve el password sólo con la información obtenida en el recuerdo de la infancia
description.russian: Подберите пароль лишь на основании сведений из воспоминания о детстве
description.brazilian: Descubra a senha reunindo apenas informações na memória da infância.

description.english: Align with Go-AT
description.german: Verbünde dich mit Go-AT.
description.french: Accepter de travailler pour Go-AT
description.spanish: Alinearse con Go-AT
description.russian: Заключите союз с Энерг-ЭТ
description.brazilian: Alinhe-se com a Go-AT.

description.english: Align with the TSB
description.german: Verbünde dich mit der TSB.
description.french: Accepter de travailler pour le BPT
description.spanish: Alinearse con la TSB
description.russian: Заключите союз с СТК
description.brazilian: Alinhe-se com a TSB.

description.english: Try to dodge the tensions between Go-AT and the TSB
description.german: Gehe den Spannungen zwischen Go-AT und TSB aus dem Weg.
description.french: Essayer d'esquiver les tensions entre Go-AT et le BPT
description.spanish: Trata de esquivar las tensiones entre Go-AT y la TSB
description.russian: Попытайтесь не встревать в конфликт между Энерг-ЭТ и СТК
description.brazilian: Tente evitar as tensões entre a Go-AT e a TSB.

displayName.english: Let the monsters kill each other
displayName.spanish: Deja que los monstruos se maten a si mismos

description.english: Try to damage Go-AT and the TSB by helping both
description.german: Schade Go-AT und der TSB, indem du beiden hilfst.
description.french: Essayer de causer du tort à Go-AT et au BPT en aidant les deux
description.spanish: Trata de dañar tanto a Go-AT como a la TSB
description.russian: Помогите и Энерг-ЭТ, и СТК, тем самым навредив обеим компаниям
description.brazilian: Tente prejudicar a Go-AT e a TSB ajudando ambas.

description.english: Good ending with Laura
description.german: Erreiche das gute Ende mit Laura.
description.french: Obtenir une bonne fin avec Laura
description.spanish: Buen final con Laura
description.russian: Дойдите до хорошей концовки с Лорой
description.brazilian: Desfecho positivo com Laura.

description.english: Neutral ending with Laura
description.german: Erreiche das neutrale Ende mit Laura.
description.french: Obtenir une fin neutre avec Laura
description.spanish: Final neutral con Laura
description.russian: Дойдите до нейтральной концовки с Лорой
description.brazilian: Desfecho neutro com Laura.

description.english: Bad ending with Laura
description.german: Erreiche das schlechte Ende mit Laura.
description.french: Obtenir une mauvaise fin avec Laura
description.spanish: Final negativo con Laura
description.russian: Дойдите до плохой концовки с Лорой
description.brazilian: Desfecho negativo com Laura.

description.english: Let the mask dominate over the creature
description.german: Lass die Maske über die Kreatur dominieren.
description.french: Laisser le masque dominer la créature
description.spanish: Deja que la máscara domine a la criatura
description.russian: Позвольте маске возобладать над существом
description.brazilian: Deixe a máscara dominar a criatura.

description.english: Nullify the mask to let the creature free
description.german: Neutralisiere die Maske, um die Kreatur freizulassen.
description.french: Annuler le pouvoir du masque pour libérer la créature
description.spanish: Neutraliza la máscara para que la criatura sea libre
description.russian: Покончите с маской, чтобы освободить существо
description.brazilian: Neutralize a máscara para libertar a criatura.

description.english: Get every impression available in the control panel
description.german: Hol dir jeden verfügbaren Eindruck über das Bedienfeld.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les impressions possibles sur le panneau de contrôle
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las impresiones del panel de control
description.russian: Получите все доступные на панели управления впечатления.
description.brazilian: Recolha todas as impressões possíveis no painel de controle.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Laura ending, Club creature free.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Lauras Ende, Wesen aus dem Club frei.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Fin de Laura, créature du club libérée.
description.spanish: (Solo Director's Cut) Final de Laura, Criatura del club Laura
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Финал «Лора», существо в клубе свободно.
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Final da Laura, sem criatura no Clube.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Get the Carl ending.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Erreiche Carls Ende.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Arriver à la fin de Carl.
description.spanish: (Solo Director’s Cut) Consigue el final de Carl
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Прийти к финалу «Карл»
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Chega ao final do Carl.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Get the Go-AT 1 ending.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Erreiche das Ende Go-AT 1.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Arriver à la 1re fin de Go-AT.
description.spanish: (Solo Director’s Cut) Consigue el final Go-AT 1
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Прийти к финалу «Энерг-ЭТ 1».
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Chega ao final da Go-AT 1.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Get the Go-AT 2 ending.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Erreiche das Ende Go-AT 2.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Arriver à la 2e fin de Go-AT.
description.spanish: (Solo Director's Cut) Consigue el final Go-AT 2
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Прийти к финалу «Энерг-ЭТ 2».
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Chega ao final da Go-AT 2.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Get the TSB 1 ending.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Erreiche das Ende TSB 1.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Arriver à la 1re fin du BPT.
description.spanish: (Solo Director's Cut) Consigue el final TSB 1
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Прийти к финалу «СТК 1».
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Chega ao final da TSB 1.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Get the TSB 2 ending.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Erreiche das Ende TSB 2.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Arriver à la 2e fin du BPT.
description.spanish: (Solo Director's Cut) Consigue el final TSB 2
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Прийти к финалу «СТК 2».
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Chega ao final da TSB 2.

description.english: (Director's Cut only) Get the Laura ending.
description.german: (Nur Director’s Cut) Erreiche Lauras Ende.
description.french: (Director's Cut uniquement) Arriver à la fin de Laura.
description.spanish: (Solo Director's Cut) Consigue el final de Laura
description.russian: (Только в режиссерской версии) Прийти к финалу «Лора».
description.brazilian: (Somente Versão do Diretor) Chega ao final da Laura.
